TITLE: Oral Communication
TASK: The Oral Communication pattern supports spoken forms of information exchange, such as lectures, presentations, and discussions. The goal is to hone students' communication skills, boost their confidence, and stimulate critical thinking. Challenges include setting clear objectives, promoting active listening, and ensuring constructive feedback. Implementing the pattern effectively requires a balance between instruction and practice, and an understanding of individual learnerâ€™s communication strengths and weaknesses.
